author: Staff Reporter
text:
Jeraldin (43) of Kaliappar Street, Mattakadai, was allegedly stabbed to death by her husband V. Thomas Roy (46) in their house on Tuesday night. Roy was a seaman and was addicted to liquor. Family dispute is suspected behind the incident.

He pushed her and stabbed on her neck with a knife, sources said. Subsequently, he committed suicide by hanging himself from a lungi. Based on a complaint lodged by Naviston Joy (44), brother of Roy, Tuticorin north police have filed a case. The bodies were taken to Tuticorin Government Medical College Hospital for post-mortem.
title: Man kills wife, ends life
